name: JAN (Keisha_Prentisha)
description:
Its dark, its late and a man’s husband is pissed he isn’t going to be home in time for dinner.

 He wont make it because he’s stuck at work with a problem…something’s wrong with JAN. Its time for the two of them to have “a friendly chat”.

 You’ll guide JAN and the man through a series of choices as they try to reach a mutual understanding. There’s one catch:  JAN can only communicate in memes.  

 JAN is a single player narrative game about interpretation and meaning.
